summary: Two sisters, no love lives. Both end up dating the same man, and inviting him to meet the family on December 17th. He doesn't know there are two sisters or that he committed to two different dates on the same day.
cast: Tia Mowry-Hardrict|Tamera Mowry-Housley|O-T Fagbenle|Chad Connell|Robin Brûlé|Jackie Richardson|Ardon Bess|Sandra Caldwell|Tonya Williams|Laura de Carteret|Richard Leacock|Mishael Morgan|Lisa Horner|Mark Forward|Derwin Phillips|Andrew Musselman|François Klanfer|Joe MacLeod|Billy Parrott
title: Doble boda
